description:
As per python documentation [1], __init__ method should not return any value explicitly, doing so will raise TypeError.

[1] https://docs.python.org/2/reference/datamodel.html#object.__init__
title: __init__ method should not return any value explicitly

comments.content:
As per python documentation [1], __init__ method should not return any value explicitly, doing so will raise TypeError.

[1] https://docs.python.org/2/reference/datamodel.html#object.__init__
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rajesh-tailor
